newsitem.title: USA: U.S. to sell $28 billion of 3-, 6-mo bills Oct 28.
newsitem.headline: U.S. to sell $28 billion of 3-, 6-mo bills Oct 28.

text.p: The Treasury Department said on Tuesday it will auction $28 billion of three- and six-month bills on Oct 28 to raise $1.3 billion, as $26.711 billion of bills are maturing.
The weekly bill sale will be equally divided between the two maturities. The bills will be issued Oct 31. The three-month bills mature January 30, 1997 and the six-month bills mature May 1, 1997.
The CUSIP number for the three-month bills is 9127943X0 and for the six-month bills is 9127942P8.
